interfaces.name: User

classes.name: ModalStoryWrapper
StorybookI18nLoader

components.name: BestPracticesComponent
components.template:
Best Practices

âœ… Use Descriptive Key Names

page_title, button_submit, error_validation

Group related keys with prefixes for organization

âœ… Use the Pipe in Templates

{{ 'greeting' | ngccI18n }}

The pipe is optimized for template updates and automatic language switching

âœ… Use Service in Component Logic

const msg = this.i18n.t('greeting');

Use the service when you need programmatic access in TypeScript

âœ… Handle Missing Translations

if (this.i18n.has('key')) { }

Check if a translation exists before using it

âœ… Type-Safe Parameters

{ name: 'Alice', count: 5, isActive: true }

Parameters can be strings, numbers, or booleans

âœ… Preload Languages for Better Performance

Load multiple languages upfront to avoid delays when switching

Useful for multi-language apps where users frequently switch languages

components.templateData:
Enterprise Dashboard

Theme Settings

System Health

CPU Usage 45%
Memory 62%
Storage 78%
Network Online

Overview

Total Users 24,521 +12.5%
Active Sessions 1,429 +5.2%
Error Rate 0.12% +0.02%
Uptime 99.98% +0.01%

Monthly Revenue Trend

Quick Actions

User Management

{{ selectedRows.length }} user(s) selected

© 2024 Enterprise Dashboard. All rights reserved.

Are you sure you want to delete {{ selectedRows.length }} user(s)?

This action cannot be undone.
@if (showNotification) {
{{ notificationMessage }}
}

components.name: LanguageSwitcherComponent
components.template:
Language Switcher

{{ 'greeting' | ngccI18n }}

{{ 'welcome' | ngccI18n: { name: 'User' } }}

Click the language buttons above to switch languages. All translations update automatically.

components.name: ParameterTranslationComponent
components.template:
Translation with Parameters

{{ 'welcome' | ngccI18n: { name: 'Alice' } }}

{{ 'item_count' | ngccI18n: { count: 5 } }}

Parameters are interpolated using {{ param }} syntax. Multiple parameters are supported.

components.name: ServiceUsageComponent
components.template:
Using Service in Component

Greeting (from service): {{ greeting }}

Welcome (from service): {{ welcome }}

Current Language: {{ currentLanguage }}

The service can be injected into components for programmatic access to translations.

components.name: SetupGuideComponent
components.template:
Setup & Installation Guide

Step 1: Configure in main.ts

{{ step1Code }}

Step 2: Create Translation Files

Create in public/assets/i18n/:

en.json:

{{ step2Code }}

Step 3: Use in Templates

{{ step3Code }}

Step 4: Or Use in Components

{{ step4Code }}

{
  title: 'Components/Dropdown',
  component: NgccDropdown,
  decorators: [
    moduleMetadata({
      imports: [NgccDropdown, NgccIcon, ReactiveFormsModule],
    }),
  ],
  tags: ['autodocs'],
  args: {
    label: 'Select an option',
    placeholder: 'Choose...',
    size: 'md',
    disabled: false,
    multi: false,
    required: false,
    readonly: false,
    skeleton: false,
    helperText: '',
    errorMessage: '',
    invalid: undefined,
    ariaLabel: '',
    items: sampleItems,
  },
  argTypes: {
    label: { control: 'text' },
    placeholder: { control: 'text' },
    size: { control: 'select', options: ['sm', 'md', 'lg'] },
    disabled: { control: 'boolean' },
    multi: { control: 'boolean' },
    required: { control: 'boolean' },
    readonly: { control: 'boolean' },
    skeleton: { control: 'boolean' },
    helperText: { control: 'text' },
    errorMessage: { control: 'text' },
    ariaLabel: { control: 'text' },
    invalid: { control: 'boolean' },
    valueChange: { action: 'valueChange' },
  },
}

{ render: () => { const fb = new FormBuilder(); const form = fb.group({ salary: [null, { validators: [Validators.required, Validators.min(1000)] }], bonus: [null, { validators: [Validators.required] }], }); return { props: { form }, template: `


Form state

Form value: {{ form.value | json }}

Form valid: {{ form.valid }}

Control values (numeric)

Salary raw: {{ form.get('salary')?.value }}

Bonus raw: {{ form.get('bonus')?.value }}

Display values (formatted)

Salary display: {{ salaryInput.displayValue() }}

Bonus display: {{ bonusInput.displayValue() }}

`, }; }, }

{ render: () => { const fb = new FormBuilder(); const form = fb.group({ salary: [null, { validators: [Validators.required, Validators.min(1000)] }], bonus: [null, { validators: [Validators.required] }], }); return { props: { form }, template: `


Form state

Form value: {{ form.value | json }}

Form valid: {{ form.valid }}

Control values (numeric)

Salary raw: {{ form.get('salary')?.value }}

Bonus raw: {{ form.get('bonus')?.value }}

Display values (formatted)

Salary display: {{ salaryInput.displayValue() }}

Bonus display: {{ bonusInput.displayValue() }}

`, }; }, }

projects/ngcc/src/lib/ngcc-input/ngcc-in.defaultValue:
{ render: () => { const fb = new FormBuilder(); const form = fb.group({ username: fb.control('', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(4), Validators.maxLength(8), Validators.pattern(/^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$/), ]), email: fb.control('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]), password: fb.control('', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(8), Validators.pattern(/^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\\d)(?=.*[!@#$%^&*]).+$/), ]), }); return { props: { form }, template: `

Form status: {{ form.status }}

Username errors: {{ form.get('username')?.errors | json }}

Email errors: {{ form.get('email')?.errors | json }}

Password errors: {{ form.get('password')?.errors | json }}

`, }; }, }
